sentences: Ma ütleks, et see on hea mõte.
Ta ütleks, kui ta teaks vastust.
Kui ma oleksin tema asemel, ma ütleks kohe.
context: The Estonian word 'ütleks' is the conditional form of the verb 'ütlema' (to say). It translates to 'would say' in English and is used to express what someone might say under certain circumstances or as a hypothetical statement. It’s commonly used when offering suggestions, expressing opinions conditionally, or reporting indirect speech.
